title: e-fsr-c61001-02
text: YENİ MEKAN BİLGİLERİ RAPORU Report on New Space Hazırlanma Tarihi / Date of Issue: ___________________________ Onaylayan / Approved By: ___________________________ Binanın Adı / Name of the Building Oda No. / Room Number Mekan Tipi / Space Type (ie Lecture Hall, Classroom, Seminar Room, Multimedia lab, Laboratory, Sports, Open Space etc.) Mekanın Maximum Kapasitesi / Max Capacity Mekanın Oturma Düzeni / Description of Seating Arrangement (ie 2 Students per Desk, Individual armdesks, Tables with Computers, etc.) Ek Bilgiler / Additional Information FSR-C61001-02-V01
